person.persName: James Oscar Hunter (Caldwell co. farmhand, pvt 3rd ky cav (csa))

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew J. Hunter and Sabra B. Hunter. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Caldwell County in 1860. Household owned two enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private from January 29, 1862 to April 13, 1865. Signed a loyalty oath to the U.S. government on May 1, 1865.
